channel.title: The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG!
channel.description:
Hey everyone! The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG! You can get our game of monster hunters in Victorian-era London at 50% off—today only!
https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/360858/The-Between

item.title: The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG!
item.dc:creator: @MDStrachan
item.description:
@MDStrachan wrote:

jasoncordova:

Hey everyone! The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG! You can get our game of monster hunters in Victorian-era London at 50% off—today only!

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/360858/The-Between

Hi there @jasoncordova, I’m a new member to the forum, living in South Africa. Unfortunately, the Rand (our currency) to Dollar exchange rate is not very strong. Do you perhaps know when The Between will next be discounted on Drivethrurpg? I really want to get my hands on a copy of the game, but right now I just can’t justify spending the full asking price for the game.

Read full topic

item.title: The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG!
item.dc:creator: @Alex
item.description:
@Alex wrote:

Played a second session, where the Whateley Camera was introduced as a threat, alongside the ongoing investigation into the Limehouse Lurker. Clues were gathered, Janus masks were used and fun was had!

Read full topic
item.source: The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG!

item.title: The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG!
item.dc:creator: @Alex
item.description:
@Alex wrote:

Ran it last night, had a fantastic funtastic session.

We had the American, the Mother, the Undeniable and the Vessel, investigating the Limehouse Lurker!

We did character creation, Dawn, Day, Dusk, Night, Dawn in our session.

My favourite bits are the Unscene and “Paint the Scene”.

The American had a problem with the quickening at dusk, and the Vessel supported them through the night.

So good.

Read full topic
item.source: The Between is Deal of the Day on DriveThruRPG!

Hope to run it next weekend.
